Tag_Propose_delete.description: Afaik it was decided to keep all the info on the Ainigmata Ostraka page, removing these individual pages (like we also removed the memory pages related to for example the Black Shuck, and Fly Agaric)

General_Description: '''Heart and Sole''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found the riddle in [[Phyllidos' House]].
Section_Riddle: ''Gone fishing! Needed some time away from [[Lamia|camp]]. Find me at the tip of a fishing spear on the island in [[Pandora's Cove]].''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the treasure.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
